summary: At the Chicago City Council meeting on June 18, 2025, Alderman Matt Martin of the 47th Ward amended Section 9-64-113 of the Municipal Code, permitting vehicles to park with two wheels on a parkway curb or carriage walk. The ordinance specifically includes West Grace Street (North side) from 1800 to 1848 among the designated areas. The change in parking regulations takes effect upon approval.
